### [Materials](/documentation/ModelIO/MDLMaterialPropertyGraph#Materials)

[`class MDLMaterial`](/documentation/modelio/mdlmaterial)A collection of material properties that together describe the intended surface appearance for rendering a 3D object.[`class MDLMaterialProperty`](/documentation/modelio/mdlmaterialproperty)A definition for one specific aspect of the rendering parameters for a material.[`class MDLMaterialPropertyConnection`](/documentation/modelio/mdlmaterialpropertyconnection)[`class MDLMaterialPropertyNode`](/documentation/modelio/mdlmaterialpropertynode)[`class MDLScatteringFunction`](/documentation/modelio/mdlscatteringfunction)A set of material properties that describes a basic shading model for materials, and the superclass for more complex shading models.[`class MDLPhysicallyPlausibleScatteringFunction`](/documentation/modelio/mdlphysicallyplausiblescatteringfunction)A set of material properties that describes a physically realistic shading model for materials.
